F3_MailformPlusPlus_View_Default::storeStartEndBlock (  )  [protected]

Copies the subparts ##FORM_STARTBLOCK### and ##FORM_ENDBLOCK### and stored them in $_SESSION. This is needed to replace the markers ##FORM_STARTBLOCK### and ##FORM_ENDBLOCK### in the next steps.

Returns:
void
